pullRequest.title: Fix a number of issues with reload listeners
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix resource reload listeners not being sorted.
Fix missing/broken reload listener keys.
Add a debug log line for missing reload keys
Add some basic tests.

commit.message:
Fix resource reload listeners not being sorted.
Fix missing/broken reload listener keys.
Add a debug log line for missing reload keys
Add some basic tests.

nodes.bodyText: You added keys for some of these?

commit.message: Undo adding new keys, we can look at this later.
